mapper.select: SELECT a.order_id, a.order_code, a.create_time, a.order_price, a.order_desc, a.server_address, a.server_name, a.appointment_time, a.order_phone, a.order_nickname, c.nickname, c.openid, c.phone, d.temp_no, d.wx_template_id, e.message_body, e.message_url, e.message_title, e.send_message_type, f.form_id FROM order_info a, shop_info b, member_info c, message_temp_info d, send_message_info e, (SELECT * FROM form_info h WHERE AND c.openid = h.open_id AND h.is_use = 0 ORDER BY create_time LIMIT 1 ) f WHERE a.order_id = '${order_id}' AND b.is_default = 1 AND c.member_no = b.server_member_no AND e.send_message_type = '${message_type}' AND d.message_temp_id = e.message_temp_id AND c.openid = f.open_id
